desc: Scope:An sporting app must be built for both iOS and Android using a hybrid approach. The app has basic form and feed functionality. The choice of framework is at the discretion of the developer but must adhere to the following constraints:●	Must be a widely supported and mature framework i.e. not Angular 1●	Must be sufficiently performant to run on devices as low as iPhone 5 and Samsung 5 galaxyA complete technical specification including UI design, API specifications and app architecture/functionality will be supplied to applicants.Technical Requirements●	The app will require an OS interface between the web app’s JavaScript and native code in order to link notifications to the app. This should be the only native code integration required.●	The web assets such as HTML, JS and CSS should be locally stored on the device and updates to the assets remotely pushable to expedite updating. The alternative approach of hosting the web assets remotely is also acceptable as long as there is a graceful offline mode.●	Facebook signup integration using web●	The resulting web app must be deployable on both iOS and Android, pending integrationThe API driving the app will be provided including documentation surrounding requests and expected JSON responses.This job will be awarded to someone who:●	Can develop the web component as well as integrate it into webviews for at least one of the two platforms (iOS or Android).●	Has extensive experience with API driven app development●	Has extensive experience with web apps and mobile-web frameworks and responsive site developmentLook forward to your bids!
title: Hybrid app build - Sporting industry

desc: <<< The Card Game >>>1. I want to make a card game called "Bhabi thulla" or  "Get Away" in Pakistan, India and Bangladesh. (For both platforms IOS and Android)2. There is already a game with the name "Bhabi - offline" in Play store3. The game already available is an offline game but I want to make a multi-player game.4. The example of the multi-player game is "Ludo Star". The game should have all the multiplayer features like this one. (like auto mode, money earning on wins and rankings etc)5. As an addition I want to introduce voice push button chat in the game.6. I want some great graphics, screens, effects and sound in the game.7. It should also have some coins/fake money earning feature as "Ludo Star" has.8. One can pay to buy coins to play more if he/she has no coins/fake money left to play.9. There should also be some help or tutorial page in the game.10. And all other stuff which a typical/standard multiplayer game should have. (like login with fb to play with friends etc.)11. Requirements may change during the development.12. I will require the game source code as well.13. After testing and development you will also deploy it on the app store and play store.14. Configure my google adsense account with for this app to display ads.15. Plus you should provide after deployement support for a month.16. Any experience
title: Build a multiplayer card game.

desc: You'll be developing an rental management system Android app which connects to a PHP-based Lumen backend. This app will allow rental vendors to manage their own products, rent schedules, customers and orders. The app will be natively developed Android Studio within 3 months. The scope of work includes building the Android app as well as building the backend calls using Lumen.You’ll be under contract, working with us for 3 months in the same office and workspace as we do, since we’ll be collaborating heavily on the backend API design as well as UI/UX design for the Android app. We have a UI/UX designer for the Android app, so you’ll be building the app as per the defined specs.We're looking for a team player who is very eager to learn new stuff with minimal supervision. You'll work with fellow teammates to share and learn together as we'll venture through technical obstacles andchallenges together to solve real-world, business problems.Basic requirements:* Java* Android Studio* Basic Android development skills* Backend skills is preferred* BYOD
title: Rental Management System Android App - 3 Months Onsite Project

desc: Here  I am listing all issues and requirements:Requirements :REMEMBER, Below 5 functionalities are done already. You just have to create 5 buttons and start each service when corresponding button clicked.We need an app with 1 screen (here functionality most important) with following functions :1) Back camera picture taking WITHOUT FLASH2) Back camera picture taking WITH FLASH3) Front camera picture taking4) Back cam video recording5) Front cam video recordingALL THESE TO BE DONE IN BACKGROUND SERVICE AND NOT ACTIVTY CODESo whenevr i click a button , the corresponding service should be started immediately and,image should be taken, and,another readymade service to be called to upload file createdand service should end when image taken and file saved.PLEASE REMEMEBER , ALL THESE ARE DONE ALREADY.YOU JUST HAVE TO MAKE 5 buttons and repair existing services forthe above 5 features.ISSUES arising:1. CamerService (one responsible for hanging device sometimes/ or not capturing image /not capturing image immediately) , needs to be fixedDevice gets frozen and stays like that until image taken. This becomes an issue when image not taken immediately and hence device stays frozen for minutes.2. BackgroundVideoRecorder (for videos) - Please chek it once, If it runs well , then good else fix.3. Front cam VIDEORECORD Not implemented yet. You please modify  Backgroundvideorecord to make it record front camera also.Or u may make a new file.I am attaching another file named ServiceCalls which tell you how this service calls are being made.Quotation not acceptable 10USD as this is MODIFICATION based only.If we like your work we may work with you in future also.
title: Solve an error on hidden camera app
